00688 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT 0x33

00690 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT 0x34
00691 
00697 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC) && \
00698                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00699                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LIST) && \
00700                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00701                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00702                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00703                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00704                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT) && \
00705                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM) && \
00706                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) && \
00707                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT) && \
00708                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY) && \
00709                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00710                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00711                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00712                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00713                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND))) ? 1 : 0)
00714 
00719 #define EXPR_IS_STATIC(x)        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC)     || \
00720                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM)      || \
00721                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) || \
00722                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT))
00723 
00728 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE( x ) & \
00729                                     ~expression_is_static_only( x ) & \
00730                                     (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE( x->suppl ) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE( x->suppl )))
00731

01299  Revision 1.69  2003/08/05 20:25:05  phase1geo
01300  Fixing non-blocking bug and updating regression files according to the fix.
01301  Also added function vector_is_unknown() which can be called before making
01302  a call to vector_to_int() which will eleviate any X/Z-values causing problems
01303  with this conversion.  Additionally, the real1.1 regression report files were
01304  updated.
01305 
01306  Revision 1.68  2003/02/27 03:41:56  phase1geo
01307  More development documentation updates.
01308 
01309  Revision 1.67  2003/02/13 23:44:08  phase1geo
01310  Tentative fix for VCD file reading.  Not sure if it works correctly when
01311  original signal LSB is != 0.  Icarus Verilog testsuite passes.
01312 
01313  Revision 1.66  2003/02/12 14:56:22  phase1geo
01314  Adding info.c and info.h files to handle new general information line in
01315  CDD file.  Support for this new feature is not complete at this time.
01316 
01317  Revision 1.65  2003/02/07 23:12:30  phase1geo
01318  Optimizing db_add_statement function to avoid memory errors.  Adding check
01319  for -i option to avoid user error.
01320 
01321  Revision 1.64  2003/01/04 09:25:15  phase1geo
01322  Fixing file search algorithm to fix bug where unexpected module that was
01323  ignored cannot be found.  Added instance7.v diagnostic to verify appropriate
01324  handling of this problem.  Added tree.c and tree.h and removed define_t
01325  structure in lexer.
01326 
01327  Revision 1.63  2003/01/03 05:52:01  phase1geo
01328  Adding code to help safeguard from segmentation faults due to array overflow
01329  in VCD parser and symtable.  Reorganized code for symtable symbol lookup and
01330  value assignment.
01331 
01332  Revision 1.62  2002/12/07 17:46:52  phase1geo
01333  Fixing bug with handling memory declarations.  Added diagnostic to verify
01334  that memory declarations are handled properly.  Fixed bug with infinite
01335  looping in statement_connect function and optimized this part of the score
01336  command.  Added diagnostic to verify this fix (always9.v).  Fixed bug in
01337  report command with ordering of lines and combinational logic verbose output.
01338  This is now fixed correctly.
01339 
01340  Revision 1.61  2002/12/06 02:18:59  phase1geo
01341  Fixing bug with calculating list and concatenation lengths when MBIT_SEL
01342  expressions were included.  Also modified file parsing algorithm to be
01343  smarter when searching files for modules.  This change makes the parsing
01344  algorithm much more optimized and fixes the bug specified in our bug list.
01345  Added diagnostic to verify fix for first bug.
01346 
01347  Revision 1.60  2002/11/27 03:49:20  phase1geo
01348  Fixing bugs in score and report commands for regression.  Finally fixed
01349  static expression calculation to yield proper coverage results for constant
01350  expressions.  Updated regression suite and development documentation for
01351  changes.
